column5: Nothing beats a fresh caught plate of perch for breakfast.  Got out for some fishing yesterday, and it was slow. Only managed a dozen perch over the course of the afternoon.  It was nice out. The sun was shining, the air was crisp and there was no wind. Only brought a handful of keepers home.   Fresh perch and a corn fritter.  YumYum!
Fried perch & corn fritters.... 2 of my favorites !!
Holly mother of cholesterol!!  Ya outta add some bok choi to that or something.  Looks nummers though!  cheers HD
ok Bruce, give me about 40 minutes or so and I will be at your place for breakfast man
Catchng a few fish in the afternoon and fresh fish for breakfast in the morning.  Life's good!
No cholesterol here    At least that's what the label on the jug says.
I was thinking collard greens!  It does look good though!!!
LOL.  They must call ya mellow yellow....  yes, quite right!!  I had two cheese and ham croissants this morning... now I'm paying the price!!  Me thinks I got the meat sweats..
I was thinking the same thing! LOL  Ya outta try edamame too.  Baby soy beans boiled and dressed with salt.  All kinds of protein, without the cholesterol.
Good going Bruce That really looks good

Edamame is excellent.   You can buy a box full of portioned sized packages at costco.   Just throw them in the microwave for 3 mins and all salt.  Not as good as in sushi bars but still pretty darn good for something thats frozen!
Nutt,n wrong with that. Some greens would be nice Dawg.
Corn critters, yum.  I somehow can't face greens for breakfast.
Fruit at brekkie I like.  Veggies? Think I'll pass. Not my idea of breakfast food.
Whatever you compliment it with, it sure looks tasty! Making me hungry for dinner.
